Package org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.parser

Lucene Query Parser

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CharStream
    This interface describes a character stream that maintains line and column number positions of the characters.
    StandardSyntaxParserConstants
    Token literal values and constants.

    Class Description

    Implementation of EscapeQuerySyntax for the standard lucene syntax.

    An efficient implementation of JavaCC's CharStream interface.

Package org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.parser Description

Lucene Query Parser

The package org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.parser contains the query parser.

This text parser only performs the syntax validation and creates an QueryNode tree from a query string.
